name: move-selected-messages
title: Move selected messages
description: Moves selected message in Apple Mail to a selected folder
author: nick_kadutskyi

commands.name: index
commands.title: Move selected emails to...
commands.subtitle: Apple Mail folder
commands.description: Lists available folders to move selected emails to

commands.name: goto
commands.title: Go to...
commands.subtitle: Apple Mail folder
commands.description: Lists available folders to go to
